name: Wildberry Trail
desc: A layered drink of different colors â€” this one does not appear to contain any alcohol. Incorporating two of Nod-Krai's signature berries, its vibrant colors feel light and cheerful, as if you're strolling down a path through a fertile orchard.

value.text: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
